Uses of Interface
net.uniform.api.Validator

  • Packages that use Validator 
    Package Description
    net.uniform.api  
    net.uniform.html.validators  
    net.uniform.impl  

    • Uses of Validator in net.uniform.api

      Methods in net.uniform.api that return types with arguments of type Validator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Validator> Element.getValidators()
      Returns the list of validators to be used in the validation of this element.
      Methods in net.uniform.api with parameters of type Validator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Element Element.addValidator(Validator validator)
      Adds a validator to the element, to be used in the Element.getValidationErrors() method.
      Element Element.removeValidator(Validator validator)
      Removes a validator from the element, if existing.
      Method parameters in net.uniform.api with type arguments of type Validator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Element Element.setValidators(List<Validator> validators)
      Replaces all validators of the element with a new list of validators.

    • Uses of Validator in net.uniform.html.validators

      Classes in net.uniform.html.validators that implement Validator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlphanumericValidator
      Validator for alphanumeric only single-value inputs.
      class  DateValidator
      Validator for date single-value inputs, with date format.
      class  InSetValidator
      Validator for single or multi value elements that must be in a given set.
      class  MultipleOptionValidator
      Validator for multi-value elements with options to ensure that any input option is valid (defined in the element) and not disabled.
      class  NumberOfSelectedOptionsValidator
      Validator for any element with options to ensure that a minimum and/or a maximum number of elements is selected.
      class  NumericValidator
      Validator for any single-value numeric input.
      class  RegexValidator
      Validator for any single-value element to conform any given regular expression.
      class  RequiredValidator
      Validator for any single or multi value element to ensure that a not null and not empty value after trimming is entered.
      class  SingleOptionValidator
      Validator for single-value elements with options to ensure that any input option is valid (defined in the element) and not disabled.
      class  StringLengthValidator
      Validator for any single-value element to ensure that the input string is within a min and/or max character length.

      Method parameters in net.uniform.impl with type arguments of type Validator
